Description: Pottery ostracon: on one side (convex) only, four incomplete and partly faded lines of a maxim concerning the might of Amun.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389241) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389241)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
